ability.name: Buster Shot
ability.description:
Fire a massive cannonball at @Target.type@, dealing @Damage.values@ (@Damage.scaling@) @Damage.type@.
If they are within @Range.values@ @Range.type@, knock them back @Knockback.values@ @Knockback.type@ and briefly @Stunned.type@ them.
ability.descriptionRaw: Fire a massive cannonball at target, dealing 280/420/635 (AD + AP) Physical Damage. If they are within 2 Hexes, knock them back 2 Hexes and briefly Stun them.

ability.name: Whimsy
ability.description:
Deal @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ to @Target.type@ and make them @Dance.type@ for @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@.
The projectile then @Bounces.type@ to the @NearestTarget.type@, dealing @BounceDamage.values@ (@BounceDamage.scaling@) @BounceDamage.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Deal 265/400/600 (AP) magic damage to target and make them dance for 2 seconds. The projectile then bounces to the nearest target, dealing 110/165/250 (AP) magic damage.

ability.name: Toxic Dart
ability.description:
Shoot the @ClosestUnpoisonedEnemy.values@ @ClosestUnpoisonedEnemy.type@, dealing @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ and @Poisoning.type@ them for @PoisonDuration.values@ @PoisonDuration.type@.
@PoisonedEnemies.type@ take @PoisonDamage.values@ (@PoisonDamage.scaling@) @PoisonDamage.type@ each second.
ability.descriptionRaw: Shoot the closest unpoisoned enemy, dealing 125/185/285 (AP) Magic Damage and poisoning them for 8 seconds. Poisoned enemies take 30/45/70 (AP) Magic Damage each second.

ability.name: Junkyard Titan
ability.description: Gain @Shield.values@ (@Shield.scaling@) @Shield.type@ for @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@. Fire a burst of flames, dealing @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ in a @Cone.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Gain 325/400/500 (AP) Shield for 4 seconds. Fire a burst of flames, dealing 72/108/162 (Armor) Magic Damage in a cone.

ability.name: Titan's Wrath
ability.description:
@Passive.type@: Every @Interval.values@ @Interval.type@ and on cast, the next attack deals damage in a @Circle.values@ @Circle.type@, dealing @BonusMagicDamage.values@ (@BonusMagicDamage.scaling@) @BonusMagicDamage.type@.

@Active.type@: Gain @Shield.values@ (@Shield.scaling@) @Shield.type@ for @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Passive: Every 4 seconds and on cast, the next attack deals damage in a 1 hex circle and deals 45/68/108 (AP) bonus magic damage. Active: Gain 465/562/717 (AP) Shield for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Stacked Deck
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Attacks deal 33/50/75 (AP) bonus Magic Damage. After every 3rd attack, throw 3 cards in a cone that deal 70/105/160 (AP) Magic Damage, reduced by 50% for each enemy they pass through. 

Partners in Crime: When you field Graves and Twisted Fate, both gain bonuses.

ability.name: Powder Kegs
ability.description:
Toss @Barrels.type@ at the @NearestEnemies.values@ @NearestEnemies.type@ and detonate them.
They deal @PhysicalDamage.values@ (@PhysicalDamage.scaling@) @PhysicalDamage.type@, reduced by @DamageReduction.values@ for each barrel in the chain.
Barrels reduce their @Target.type@'s @Armor.type@ by @ArmorReduction.values@, increased to @CritArmorReduction.values@ if the damage @CriticallyStrikes.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Toss Barrels at the 3 Nearest Enemies and detonate them. They deal 200/300/475 (AD + AP) Physical Damage, reduced by 20% for each barrel in the chain. Barrels reduce their Target's Armor by 10, increased to 30 if the damage Critically Strikes.

ability.name: Tentacle Smash
ability.description: Restore @Health.values@ (@Health.scaling@) @Health.type@ and slam a tentacle, dealing @AttackDamage.values@ (@AttackDamage.scaling@) @AttackDamage.type@ to @Enemies.type@ in a line.
ability.descriptionRaw: Restore 249/328/439 (Health + Ability power) Health and slam a tentacle, dealing 180/270/405 (Attack damage) Physical Damage to enemies in a line.

ability.name: Heartbreaker
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Attacks ricochet to the highest current Health enemy, dealing 50% damage.
Active: Fire waves of bullets that land on the 2 nearest enemies. The first wave deals 140/215/1070 (AD + AP) physical damage and the rest deal 140/215/1070 (AD + AP) physical damage. Every 3rd cast, increase the number of waves by 1.

ability.name: Soul Furnace
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Takedowns grant 18/20/50 permanent Max Health.
Active: Gain 190/242/336 (HP + AP) Shield for 4 seconds. When it breaks, deal 46/82/147 (AP) Magic Damage to adjacent enemies.

ability.name: Blood Frenzy
ability.description: @Leap.type@ to the @FurthestEnemy.type@ within @Range.values@ @Range.type@. For @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@ gain increased @MoveSpeed.type@, @AttackDamage.values@ @AttackDamage.type@, and @AttackSpeed.values@ (@AttackSpeed.scaling@) decaying @AttackSpeed.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Leap to the furthest enemy within 3 Hexes. For 4 Seconds gain increased Move Speed, 25% Attack Damage, and 300% (AP) decaying Attack Speed.

ability.name: Spinning Axes
ability.descriptionRaw: Passive: If Draven has an Empowered Axe in hand, his next attack will throw it. On Takedown, gain an Adoration Stack, doubled if Draven or Darius scored the kill. Every 11 Adoration Stacks grants 1/3/5 Gold. Active: Spin an Empowered Axe that replaces his basic attack and deals 150/225/375 (AD + AP) Physical Damage and returns to Draven after hitting an Enemy.

ability.name: Lacerate
ability.description:
Swipe and @Dash.type@ around @Target.type@, dealing @SwipeDamage.values@ (@SwipeDamage.scaling@) @SwipeDamage.type@ to @EnemiesInPath.values@ @EnemiesInPath.type@.
Then slam chains on @Target.type@, dealing @ChainDamage.values@ (@ChainDamage.scaling@) @ChainDamage.type@ in a @Line.values@ @Line.type@.
If any @Enemies.type@ are killed, immediately recast this @Ability.type@, dealing @RecastDamage.values@ @RecastDamage.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Swipe and dash around target, dealing 50/75/350 (AD + AP) physical damage to enemies in the path. Then slam chains on target, dealing 50/75/350 (AD + AP) physical damage in a line. If any enemies are killed, immediately recast this ability, dealing 100% damage.

ability.name: Double Trouble Bubble
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Damaging an enemy applies 30% Shred for 6 seconds. Active: Kick 2 bubbles at nearby enemies, dealing 330/500/825 (AP) magic damage and 30% Chilling them for 3 seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed

ability.name: Solar Flare
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Reduce instances of incoming damage by 15/35/70 (AP). Active: Call down Sun Beams on the 3 Nearest Enemies, Stunning them for 1 Second and dealing 90/130/220 (AP) Magic Damage. Wound and 1% Burn them for 4 Seconds.

Wound: Reduce Healing Received by 33%.
Burn: Deal a percent of the target's Max Health as True Damage every second.

ability.name: Incendiary Onslaught
ability.descriptionRaw:
Start with Infernum equipped. On cast, switch to Severum for 8 attacks.
Infernum: Attacks hit 3 enemies and apply 30% Sunder for 6 seconds.
Severum: Gain 200% Attack Speed and 10% Omnivamp. Attacks are replaced with swipes that deal 70/105/175 (AD) Physical Damage.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

ability.name: Starlight's Touch
ability.description:
@Passive.type@: All @Allies.type@ gain @MRBonus.values@ @MRBonus.type@. Once per combat after dropping below @Threshold.values@ @Threshold.type@, gain @DurabilityBonus.values@ @DurabilityBonus.type@ for @DurabilityDuration.values@ @DurabilityDuration.type@.

@Active.type@: Gain @Shield.values@ (@Shield.scaling@) @Shield.type@ and grant the @LowestHealthAllies.values@ @LowestHealthAllies.type@ @AllyShield.values@ (@AllyShield.scaling@) @AllyShield.type@ for @ShieldDuration.values@ @ShieldDuration.type@. The next @EnhancedAttacks.values@ @EnhancedAttacks.type@ deal @BonusDamage.values@ (@BonusDamage.scaling@) @BonusDamage.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: All allies gain 10/20/100 Magic Resist. Once per combat after dropping below 35% max Health, gain 90% Durability for 2 seconds.

Active: Gain 600/700/2500 (AP) Shield and grant the 2 lowest Health allies 125/150/1000 (AP) Shield for 4 seconds. The next 2/2/10 attacks deal 200/300/3000 (AP) bonus magic damage.

ability.name: Demacian Standard
ability.description:
Gain @Shield.values@ (@Shield.scaling@) @Shield.type@ for @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@
Grant @AllAllied.type@ @AttackSpeed.values@ (@AttackSpeed.scaling@) @AttackSpeed.type@ for @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Gain 325/425/500 (AP) Shield for 4 seconds. Grant all allies 15/20/33% (AP) Attack Speed for 4 Seconds.

ability.name: Power Chord
ability.description: Deal @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ to @NearbyEnemies.values@ @NearbyEnemies.type@ and Restore @Heal.values@ (@Heal.scaling@) @Heal.type@ to the @HealthAlly.values@ @HealthAlly.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Deal 120/180/270 (AP) Magic Damage to 2 N?earby Enemies and Restore 40/50/80 (AP) Health to the Lowest Health Ally.

ability.name: Judgment
ability.description:
Spin for @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@, gaining @DurabilityBonus.values@ @DurabilityBonus.type@ and healing for @Heal.values@ (@Heal.scaling@) @Heal.type@ over the duration.
Each second, deal @SpinDamage.values@ (@SpinDamage.scaling@) @SpinDamage.type@ to @AdjacentEnemies.values@ @AdjacentEnemies.type@ and reduce their @Armor.type@ and @MR.type@ Resistance by @ArmorMRReduction.values@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Spin for 3 seconds, gaining 50/50/90% Durability and healing for 420/566/1389 (HP) over the duration. Each second, deal 100/150/1700 (AD) physical damage to adjacent enemies and reduce their Armor and Magic Resistance by 5.

ability.name: Final Spark
ability.description:
Fire a ball of light at the @MostEnemies.values@ @MostEnemies.type@, dealing @PrimaryDamage.values@ (@PrimaryDamage.scaling@) @PrimaryDamage.type@ to the @FirstTargets.values@ @FirstTargets.type@ and @Rooted.type@ them for @RootDuration.values@ @RootDuration.type@.
Then fire a beam, dealing @BeamDamage.values@ (@BeamDamage.scaling@) @BeamDamage.type@ to @EnemiesHit.values@ @EnemiesHit.type@ by the ball and @SecondaryDamage.values@ (@SecondaryDamage.scaling@) @SecondaryDamage.type@ to all other enemies hit.
ability.descriptionRaw: Fire a ball of light at the most enemies, dealing 30/45/100 (AP) magic damage to the first 2 enemies hit and Rooting them for 1 second. Then fire a beam, dealing 290/435/1600 (AP) magic damage to enemies hit by the ball and 90/135/900 (AP) magic damage to all other enemies hit.

ability.name: Frostbite
ability.descriptionRaw: Fire an ice shard at target that deals 325/455/650 (AP) Magic Damage. If they are Chilled, the Damage Critically Strikes.Chill: Reduce Attack Speed

ability.name: True Ice Arrow
ability.descriptionRaw:
Fire an arrow at target that deals 140/210/325 (AD + AP) Physical Damage to them and 140/210/325 (AD + AP) damage to adjacent enemies. Targets below 30% max Health take true damage instead. 30% Chill all enemies hit for 3 seconds.
Bloodsworn Bond: Attacks fire a bonus arrow for every 10% Attack Damage granted to Tryndamere by Bloodsworn Bond. These arrows deal 2.65/3.98/5.96 (AD) Physical Damage.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed

ability.name: Unbreakable Frost
ability.description:
Raise @Shield.type@ for @ShieldDuration.values@ @ShieldDuration.type@, gaining @DurabilityPercent.values@ @DurabilityPercent.type@ and redirecting @Projectiles.type@ toward @Braum.type@ instead.
When hit, deal @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ to @NearbyEnemies.values@ @NearbyEnemies.type@ and @ChillPercent.values@ @ChillPercent.type@ them for @ChillDuration.values@ @ChillDuration.type@
ability.descriptionRaw: Raise shield for 4 seconds, gaining 55%/55%/90% durability and redirecting projectiles to Braum instead. When hit, deal 27/43/1245 (AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and 30% Chill them for 2 seconds.

ability.name: Frozen Tomb
ability.descriptionRaw:
Encase target in ice, Stunning them for 1 second and dealing 275/415/2800 (AP) Magic Damage. All enemies within 2 hexes of them split 415/625/2800 (AP) Magic Damage. If the target dies, shards fly out and split excess damage between the 2 nearest enemies. Chilled enemies take 12% more damage from this ability.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed

ability.name: Ultra Mega Fire Kick!!!
ability.description:
Launch a Fuemigo at @Target.type@ that @Bounces.type@ @Bounces.values@ times, dealing @BallDamage.values@ (@BallDamage.scaling@) @BallDamage.type@ to @Enemies.type@ hit.
The last @Bounces.type@ deals @LastBounceDamage.values@ (@LastBounceDamage.scaling@) @LastBounceDamage.type@ to @Enemies.type@ in a @Radius.values@ @Radius.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Launch a fuemigo at target that bounces 3 times, dealing 190/285/445 (AP) magic damage to enemies hit. The last bounce deals 160/240/375 (AP) magic damage to enemies in a 1 hex radius.

ability.name: Pop Blossom
ability.descriptionRaw:
Leap at target and gain 400/500/650 (AP) Shield for 4 seconds. Slam down after a brief delay, dealing 150/225/350 (AP) Magic Damage to enemies within two Hexes and 20% Chilling them for 3 seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed

ability.name: Switcheroo!
ability.description:
@Passive.type@: After attacking @AttackCount.values@ @AttackCount.type@, @Switch.type@ to @Fishbones.type@.
While equipped, attacks are replaced with @RocketsCount.values@ @RocketsCount.type@ that target @RandomEnemies.values@ @RandomEnemies.type@ and deal @PhysicalDamage.values@ (@PhysicalDamage.scaling@) @PhysicalDamage.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Passive: After attacking 18/18/16 Times, switch to Fishbones. While equipped, attacks are replaced with 3 Rockets that target Random Enemies and deal 42/63/109 (AD) Physical Damage.

ability.name: Ace in the Hole
ability.description: Fire a bullet towards the @FarthestEnemy.values@ @FarthestEnemy.type@, @AttackDamage.values@ (@AttackDamage.scaling@) @AttackDamage.type@ to the @FirstEnemy.values@ @FirstEnemy.type@ it hits. If they die, the bullet @Ricochets.type@, dealing excess damage to the @NextEnemy.values@ @NextEnemy.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Fire a bullet towards the farthest enemy, dealing 515/775/1205 (Attack damage + Ability power) Physical Damage to the first enemy it hits. If they die, the bullet ricochets, dealing excess damage to the next enemy hit.

ability.name: Relentless Force
ability.descriptionRaw: Gain 125/150/175 (AP) Shield for 2 seconds. Slam on target, dealing 120/180/270 (AD) Physical Damage to enemies in a 1 Hex Range. Every third cast deals 150/225/340 (AD) damage in a 2 Hex Range instead and knocks up enemies hit for 1 second.

ability.name: Grand Encore
ability.description:
Gain @Notes.values@ @Notes.type@. For each one active, deal @NoteDamage.values@ (@NoteDamage.scaling@) @NoteDamage.type@ to a @NearbyEnemy.values@ @NearbyEnemy.type@.
While holding @MaxNotes.values@ @MaxNotes.type@ on cast, consume them to project a wave of energy.
Allies hit restore @AllyHeal.values@ (@AllyHeal.scaling@) @AllyHeal.type@.
Enemies hit take @WaveDamage.values@ (@WaveDamage.scaling@) @WaveDamage.type@, reduced by @ReductionPerEnemy.values@ for each enemy it's passed through.
ability.descriptionRaw:
Gain 3 notes. For each one active, deal 25/40/200 (AP) magic damage to a nearby enemy.
While holding 12 notes on cast, consume them to project a wave of energy. Allies hit restore 60/90/400 (AP) Health. Enemies hit take 270/405/2200 (AP) magic damage, reduced by 30% for each enemy it's passed through.

ability.name: Sweeping Blade
ability.descriptionRaw: Dash, then deal 78/117/179 (AD + AP) Physical Damage to adjacent enemies. If only one enemy is hit, deal double damage. Blade Brothers: When Yone casts, your strongest Yasuo blinks to every target Yone hits and deals 100% Physical Damage to each.

ability.name: Fox-Fire
ability.description:
Fire @FlamesCount.values@ @FlamesCount.type@ at @Target.type@, each dealing @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@.
Every @ThirdCast.values@ @ThirdCast.type@, fire @SplitFlamesCount.values@ @SplitFlamesCount.type@ split between the @Target.type@ and up to @NearbyEnemies.values@ @NearbyEnemies.type@.
If there are @NearbyEnemiesOnly.values@ @NearbyEnemiesOnly.type@, @Dash.type@ away.
ability.descriptionRaw: Fire 3 Flames at Target, each dealing 85/130/200 (AP) Magic Damage. Every 3rd Cast, fire 9 Flames split between the Target and up to 2 Nearby Enemies. If there are Nearby Enemies, Dash away.

ability.name: Diverting Trickster
ability.description:
@Passive.type@: On death, summon a @StoneCopy.type@ with @CloneHealth.values@ (@CloneHealth.scaling@) @CloneHealth.type@ and @Items.type@.

@Active.type@: For @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@, gain @ArmorMR.values@ (@ArmorMR.scaling@) @Armor.type@ and @MR.type@. Then spin, dealing @SpinDamage.values@ (@SpinDamage.scaling@) @SpinDamage.type@ to @EnemiesWithin.values@ @EnemiesWithin.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: On death, summon a Stone copy with 570/956/3361 (HP) Health and Wukong's items.

Active: For 4 seconds, gain 100/110/400 (AP) Armor and Magic Resist. Then spin, dealing 150/225/3000 (AD) physical damage to all enemies within 2 hexes.

ability.name: Stand United
ability.description: Grant @Shield.values@ (@Shield.scaling@) @Shield.type@ to this @Unit.type@ and a @NearbyAlly.valuey@ @NearbyAlly.type@ for @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Grant 250/325/425 (AP) Shield to this Unit and a Nearby Damaged Ally for 4 Seconds.

ability.name: Void Swarm
ability.description:
Summon @Voidlings.values@ @Voidlings.type@ that each attack a @NearbyEnemy.values@ @NearbyEnemy.type@ @AttacksPerVoidling.values@ times.
Each attack deals @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Voidlings that each attack a nearby enemy 10 times. Each attack deals 30/45/80 (AP) magic damage.

ability.name: Burrow
ability.description:
Dash to the @FurthestEnemy.values@ @FurthestEnemy.type@ within @Range.values@ @Range.type@ and deal @PrimaryDamage.values@ (@PrimaryDamage.scaling@) @PrimaryDamage.type@ to them.
The next @FollowupAttacks.values@ @FollowupAttacks.type@ hit @AdjacentEnemies.type@ and deal @SecondaryDamage.values@ (@SecondaryDamage.scaling@) @SecondaryDamage.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Dash to the furthest enemy within 3 hexes and deal 160/240/360 (AD + AP) Physical Damage to them. The next 3 attacks hit adjacent enemies and deal 110/165/260 (AD) Physical Damage.

ability.name: Rupture
ability.description:
Restore @Heal.values@ (@Heal.scaling@) @Heal.type@ to @Unit.type@.
Rupture a @Circle.values@ @Circle.type@ beneath @Target.type@.
After a brief delay, @Enemies.type@ within are @KnockedUp.type@ for @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@ and take @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Restore 180/200/250 (AP + HP) Health and rupture a 2 Hex Circle beneath target. After a brief delay, enemies within are knocked up for 1.5 seconds and take 88/152/248 (HP + AP) Magic Damage.

ability.name: Caustic Spittle
ability.description:
Deal @MagicDamage.values@ @MagicDamage.type@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) to @Target.type@ and reduce their @Armor.type@ and @MagicResist.type@ by @ArmorMRReduction.values@.
@Adjacent.type@ are dealt @AdjacentDamagePercent.values@ of the damage and effect.
ability.descriptionRaw: Deal 140/200/300 (AP) magic damage to target and reduce their Armor and Magic Resist by 8/10/15. Adjacent enemies are dealt 50% of the damage and effect.

ability.name: Enraged Inferno
ability.descriptionRaw:
Erupt the entire battlefield in flames, permanently Burning and Wounding all enemies and dealing 1500/2250/8000 (AP) magic damage to each of them over 45 seconds.

Annie's max Mana is reduced by 150 for the rest of combat. Subsequent casts launch a fireball at target that deals 240/360/3000 (AP) magic damage.

Burn: Deal a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second.
Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%.

ability.name: Call of the Forge
ability.descriptionRaw:
Summon an elemental from behind the farthest enemy. It 20% Chills enemies hit for 3 seconds and deals 100/150/3000 (AP) magic damage to them.

When it arrives, headbutt it and redirect it toward another distant enemy, dealing 150/225/4500 (AP) magic damage instead.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed

ability.name: Lamb's Respite
ability.description:
Dash, then create a @HexRadius.values@ @HexRadius.type@ zone for @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@ that prevents @Allies.type@ within from dying.
While active, double current @AttackSpeed.type@ and on attack, fire a secondary arrow at a nearby enemy that deals @PhysicalDamage.values@ (@PhysicalDamage.scaling@) @PhysicalDamage.type@.

When the @Zone.type@ ends, @Heal.type@ all @Allies.type@ for @HealPercent.values@ (@HealPercent.scaling@) of damage dealt while it was up and @Dash.type@ away.
ability.descriptionRaw:
Dash, then create a 2-hex radius zone for 2.5/2.5/99 seconds that prevents allies within from dying. While active, double current Attack Speed and on attack, fire a secondary arrow at a nearby enemy that deals 25/38/999 (AD) physical damage.

When the zone ends, heal all allies for 800% (AP) of damage dealt while it was up and dash away.

ability.name: Arise!
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: After witnessing 3 attacks from Azir, Sand Soldiers deal 100/150/3000 (AP) magic damage to their target.

Active: Summon a Sand Soldier near target and command them to strike. If 2 Soldiers are already out, they all immediately deal 70/105/1500 (AP) magic damage instead.

ability.name: Visions of the End
ability.description:
Throw a @TimeBomb.type@ on the @NearestEnemy.values@ @NearestEnemy.type@ without one.
@TimeBombs.type@ deal @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ each @Interval.values@ @Interval.type@.
When the @Target.type@ dies, they @Explode.type@, dealing @ExplosionDamage.values@ (@ExplosionDamage.scaling@) @ExplosionDamage.type@ in a @Radius.values@ @Radius.type@ and grant @AllAllies.type@ @Mana.values@ @Mana.type@.

If a @TimeBomb.type@ is on an @Enemy.type@ for @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@ and @Zilean.type@ is alive, the @Enemy.type@ @InstantlyDies.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw:
Throw a Time Bomb on the nearest enemy without one. Time Bombs deal 75/115/1000 (AP) magic damage each second. When the target dies, they explode, dealing 150/225/4000 (AP) magic damage in a 1 hex radius and grant all allies 15 mana.

If a Time Bomb is on an enemy for 18/16/1 seconds and Zilean is alive, the enemy instantly dies.

ability.name: Crowstorm
ability.descriptionRaw: Teleport into the largest cluster of enemies and Stun them for 1.75/1.75/99 seconds. Begin losing 20 mana per second. While casting, deal 95/140/6666 (AP) magic damage per second to all enemies within a 2 hex radius. The closest 2 enemies take 33% more damage.

ability.name: Dragon's Descent / Flame Breath
ability.descriptionRaw:
Dragon's Descent: Transform into a dragon, gaining 600/1000/9999 max Health. Briefly gain 20/20/90% Durability and dive-bomb into the largest group of enemies, dealing 100/150/3000 (AP) physical damage in a 3 hex circle.

Flame Breath: Breath fire in a cone for 3.5 seconds, dealing 170/255/13579 (AD + AP) physical damage each second to enemies hit.

ability.name: Inspirational Might
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Every 3rd attack deals 247/371/5850 (Armor + MR) magic damage in a circle around the target.

Active: Dash into the largest group of units and inspire all allies within 2 hexes, granting them 500/600/2000 (AP) Shield for 4 seconds. Then crash down, dealing 260/439/3250 (Armor + MR) bonus magic damage to all enemies with 2 hexes.

champions.name: Galio
champions.unlockDescription: 12 Star Levels of Demacia

ability.name: Devour
ability.description:
@Devour.type@ @Target.type@ for @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@, dealing @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ and making them @Immune.type@ to @OtherSources.type@.
During this time, gain @Durability.values@ @Durability.type@.
If they are @ImmuneToCrowdControl.type@, deal @AlternateDamage.values@ (@AlternateDamage.scaling@) @AlternateDamage.type@ instead.

If they die while @Devoured.type@, spit out a @RandomComponent.type@ they were holding + the @UnitCost.type@ in @Gold.type@.
Otherwise, spit them towards the @FarthestEnemy.values@ @FarthestEnemy.type@, briefly @Stunning.type@ @TargetsOnImpact.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw:
Devour target for 2.5 seconds, dealing 900/1400/30000 (AP) magic damage and making them immune to other sources of damage. During this time, gain 30% Durability. If they are immune to crowd control, deal 600/900/20000 (AP) magic damage instead.

If they die while devoured, spit out a random component they were holding + the unit's cost in gold. Otherwise, spit them towards the farthest enemy, briefly Stunning targets on impact.

champions.name: Tahm Kench
champions.unlockDescription: Spend 500 Silver Serpents

ability.name: Winter's Wrath
ability.description:
Gain @Shield.values@ (@Shield.scaling@) @Shield.type@ for @ShieldDuration.values@ @ShieldDuration.type@.
Strike in a @Cone.type@ and a @Line.type@.
Enemies hit take @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ and are @ChillPercent.values@ @Chill.type@ for @ChillDuration.values@ @ChillDuration.type@.
If they are already @Chilled.type@, @Stun.type@ them for @StunDuration.values@ @StunDuration.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Gain 475/525/625 (AP) Shield for 4 seconds. Strike in a cone and a line. Enemies hit take 70/105/170 (AP) magic damage and are 30% Chilled for 4 seconds. If they are already Chilled, Stun them for 1 second.

ability.name: The Show Stopper
ability.description:
@Grab.type@ @Target.type@ and @Slam.type@ them @Forward.type@, dealing @BaseDamage.values@ (@BaseDamage.scaling@) + @MaxHealthPercent.values@ (@MaxHealthPercent.scaling@) of their @MaxHealth.type@ as @MagicDamage.type@ to them.
@AllOtherEnemies.type@ within @Range.values@ @Range.type@ take @DamagePercent.values@ of the @TotalDamage.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Grab target and slam them forward, dealing 220/330/9999 (AP) + 600%/900%/90000% (AP) of their max Health as magic damage to them. All other enemies within 3 hexes take 50% of the total damage.

champions.name: Sett
champions.unlockDescription: Level 8 + Field only 1 Unit in the first 2 rows of combat

ability.name: Seismic Slam
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Immune to crowd control effects. Attacks briefly knock up the target and deal 50% damage in a 1 hex radius around them.

Active: Slam the ground, dealing 190/272/1630 (AP + AD) physical damage to all enemies, reduced by 15% for each hex from the center (down to 40%). If this is the first time they've been hit by Seismic Slam this combat, knock them up for up to 1.75 seconds. Summon 12/12/9 rocks that fall around the battlefield, each dealing 270/405/700 (AD + AP) physical damage to enemies hit.

champions.name: Brock
champions.unlockDescription: Collect 500 Ixtal Clues total

ability.name: Hextech Arsenal
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Attacks fire a barrage of 4 bullets.

Active: Gain 28300/50800/157386 (AP) Shield and begin consuming 33 mana per second. Each second while active, fire a laser that deals 145/215/2150 (AD + AP) physical damage, reduced by 15% per enemy hit up to 45%. Additionally, launch 4 (AD) missiles split between 4 nearby enemies that each deal 145/215/2150 (AD + AP) physical damage.

champions.name: T-Hex
champions.unlockDescription: 9 Piltover Star Levels

ability.name: Endless Banquet
ability.descriptionRaw: Passive: On takedown, gain 100/100/200% stacking attack speed that decays over 3 seconds. Active: Deal 150/225/900 (AP) physical damage in a 2 hex radius and transform for the rest of combat. While transformed, gain 3300%/3300%/13300% attack speed, 33% max health, and increased move speed. Attacks deal 15/25/100 bonus true damage, increased by 3/5/30 for each time the same enemy is hit.

ability.name: Poison Trail
ability.description:
@Passive.type@: Run around the battlefield, leaving a @PoisonTrail.type@ that lingers for @TrailDuration.values@ @TrailDuration.type@. Poison trails deal @TrailDamage.values@ (@TrailDamage.scaling@) @TrailDamage.type@ per second to @EnemiesWithin.values@ @EnemiesWithin.type@. Gain @ManaPerSecond.values@ (@ManaPerSecond.scaling@) @ManaPerSecond.type@ each second.

@Active.type@: For @ActiveDuration.values@ @ActiveDuration.type@, gain increased @MoveSpeed.type@, restore @Heal.values@ (@Heal.scaling@) @Heal.type@ each second, and gain @ArmorBonus.values@ @ArmorBonus.type@ and @MRBonus.values@ @MRBonus.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Run around the battlefield, leaving a poison trail that lingers for 4 seconds. Poison trails deal 23/34/160 (AP) magic damage per second to enemies within. Gain 7 (Mana) Mana each second.

Active: For 4 seconds, gain increased Move Speed, restore 80/100/500 (AP) Health each second, and gain 50 Armor and Magic Resistance.

champions.name: Singed
champions.unlockDescription: Take 30 damage and 4 Zaunites or Juggernauts

ability.name: The Skies Descend
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: After dealing ability damage to an enemy, gain Stardust. Stardust makes The Skies Descend more powerful.

Active: Crash a star on target, dealing 325/575/5000 (AP) magic damage in a 2 hex radius.

Stardust Upgrades:
15: Create a shockwave that deals 50/75/1000 (AP) additional magic damage in a 3 Hex radius.
60: The star crash deals 12% more damage.
100: Shockwave increases to a 4 hex radius.
175: Knock up targets in the star crash for 2 seconds.
250: Shockwave increases to 10 radius.
400: The star crash deals 25% bonus true damage.
700: Also call down a meteor storm that deals 1000/1500/9999 (AP) magic damage split between living enemies.
1400: Summon a black hole at the epicenter, instantly killing enemies within.

champions.name: Aurelion Sol
champions.unlockDescription: Field Targon 5 in Combat

ability.name: Dark Storm
ability.description:
@Passive.type@: Gain @APBonus.values@ @APBonus.type@ from all sources.

@Active.type@: Call down a storm of @MeteorCount.values@ @MeteorCount.type@ across the battlefield that deal @MeteorDamage.values@ (@MeteorDamage.scaling@) @MeteorDamage.type@ each. They can innately @CriticalStrike.type@. For each one that kills an @Enemy.type@, permanently gain @PermanentAP.values@ @PermanentAP.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Gain 50% more Ability Power from all sources.

Active: Call down a storm of 12/12/24 meteors across the battlefield that deal 60/90/150 (AP) magic damage each. They can innately critically strike. For each one that kills an enemy, permanently gain 1 Ability Power. (Permanent Ability Power: X AP)

champions.name: Veigar
champions.unlockDescription: Field a unit with 2 Rabadon's Deathcaps in combat

ability.name: Wrath of the Void
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Immune to Crowd Control effects. Attacks deal damage in a line on target. If no enemies are in range, dash to the next one and knock up adjacent enemies on arrival.

While in the Void Rift, erupt a tentacle below a random enemy every 3/3/0.25 seconds that knocks them up for 1.5 seconds.

Active: Slam and erect spikes in a 2 hex circle, dealing 280/420/20500 (AD + AP) physical damage to enemies hit. Then over 3 seconds, spit 10 globs of acid that deal 140/210/10250 (AD + AP) physical damage.

champions.name: Baron Nashor
champions.unlockDescription: Level 10 + Void 7

ability.name: Decimate
ability.description:
Restore @Heal.values@ (@Heal.scaling@) @Heal.type@ and spin, dealing @SpinDamage.values@ (@SpinDamage.scaling@) @SpinDamage.type@ to @AdjacentEnemies.values@ @AdjacentEnemies.type@ and applying @Hemorrhage.type@.

@Hemorrhage.type@ deals @HemorrhageDamage.values@ (@HemorrhageDamage.scaling@) @HemorrhageDamage.type@ each second for @HemorrhageDuration.values@ @HemorrhageDuration.type@.
If an enemy with @Hemorrhage.type@ drops below @ExecuteThreshold.values@ @ExecuteThreshold.type@, slam on them, instantly killing them.
Each stack increases the execute threshold by @ExecuteIncrease.values@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Restore 250/352/512 (AP + HP) Health and spin, dealing 90/135/210 (AD) physical damage to adjacent enemies and applying a stack of Hemorrhage that deals 15/25/40 (AD) physical damage each second for 4 seconds. If an enemy with Hemorrhage drops below 8% Health, slam on them, instantly killing them. (Each stack increases the execute threshold by 5%)

champions.name: Darius
champions.unlockDescription: Have Draven drop 1 Gold

ability.name: Kin of the Stained Blade
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Attacks alternate between dealing 80/120/800 (AD) bonus physical damage and 140/210/1400 (AP) bonus magic damage.

Active: Strike through the most enemies possible within 3 hexes, knocking them up for 1.5 seconds and dealing 80/120/480 (AD + AP) physical damage and 80/120/480 (AD + AP) magic damage. Yone then splits 320/480/2160 (AD + AP) physical damage and 320/480/2160 (AD + AP) magic damage among all enemies hit.

Blade Brothers: When Yone casts, your strongest Yasuo blinks to each target, dealing bonus physical damage.

champions.name: Yone
champions.unlockDescription: 3 Star Yasuo

ability.name: Eternal Hunger
ability.description:
Gain @AttackSpeed.values@ @AttackSpeed.type@, @Omnivamp.values@ @Omnivamp.type@, increased @MoveSpeed.type@, and deal @BonusDamage.values@ (@BonusDamage.scaling@) @BonusDamage.type@ on attack for the rest of @Combat.type@.
While this effect is active, @Takedowns.type@ grant Warwick, Jinx, and Vi @AllyAttackSpeed.values@ (@AllyAttackSpeed.scaling@) @AllyAttackSpeed.type@ for @AllyASDuration.values@ @AllyASDuration.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Gain 100/100/400% Attack Speed, 15% Omnivamp, increased Move Speed, and deal 45/70/550 (AD) bonus physical damage on attack for the rest of combat. While this effect is active, takedowns grant Warwick, Jinx, and Vi 20/20/50% (AP) Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

champions.name: Warwick
champions.unlockDescription: 2 Star Jinx & 2 Star Vi

ability.name: Playful Trickster
ability.description:
Become briefly @Untargetable.type@, then @Jump.type@ to the @FarthestEnemy.values@ @FarthestEnemy.type@ within @Range.values@ @Range.type@ and deal @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ to @AdjacentEnemies.values@ @AdjacentEnemies.type@.
For the next @Attacks.values@ @Attacks.type@, gain @AttackSpeedBonus.values@ @AttackSpeedBonus.type@ and deal @BonusMagicDamage.values@ (@BonusMagicDamage.scaling@) @BonusMagicDamage.type@ on hit.
ability.descriptionRaw: Become briefly untargetable, then jump to the farthest enemy within 4 hexes and deal 75/115/300 (AP) magic damage to adjacent enemies. For the next 4 attacks, gain 50% Attack Speed and deal 70/105/450 (AP) bonus magic damage on hit.

champions.name: Fizz
champions.unlockDescription: Field 5 Yordles or Bilgewater Units + Level 7

ability.name: Hammer Shock
ability.description:
Gain @Shield.values@ (@Shield.scaling@) @Shield.type@ for @ShieldDuration.values@ @ShieldDuration.type@ and deal @PhysicalDamage.values@ (@PhysicalDamage.scaling@) @PhysicalDamage.type@ to @Target.type@.
After a delay, briefly @KnockedUp.type@ and deal the damage again.
Bucklers fly out from @Unit.type@, granting @NearbyAllies.values@ @NearbyAllies.type@ @ShieldPercent.values@ @ShieldPercent.type@ of the Shield gained.
ability.descriptionRaw: Gain 330/410/500 (AP) Shield for 4 seconds and deal 70/105/165 (AD) Physical Damage to target. After a delay, briefly knock them up and deal the damage again. Bucklers fly out from the target, granting 2 nearby allies 30% of the Shield gained.

champions.name: Poppy
champions.unlockDescription: Field a Demacian or Yordle with 2 items in combat.

ability.name: Slicing Maelstrom
ability.description:
Gain @Shield.values@ (@Shield.scaling@) @Shield.type@ and summon a storm of lightning.
@Waves.values@ @Waves.type@ hit @Enemies.type@ within, dealing @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ over @DamageDuration.values@ @DamageDuration.type@
The @FirstTargets.values@ targets struck by @BoltsPerTarget.values@ bolts are @Stun.type@ for @StunDuration.values@ @StunDuration.type@.
Multiple @Stun.type@ on the same enemy have @StunEffectiveness.values@ effectiveness.
ability.descriptionRaw: Gain 600/700/900 (AP) Shield and summon storm of lightning. 6 waves of bolts hit enemies within, dealing 120/180/290 (AP) magic damage over 3 seconds. The first 3 targets to be struck by 3 bolts are Stunned for 1.5 seconds. Multiple stuns on the same enemy have 50% effectiveness.

champions.name: Kennen
champions.unlockDescription: 8 Star Levels of Ionia, Yordle, or Defender

ability.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
ability.description:
@Passive.type@: Attacks are replaced with a @Bomb.type@ that @Bounces.type@ @BounceCount.values@ @BounceCount.type@, dealing @PassiveMagicDamage.values@ (@PassiveMagicDamage.scaling@) @PassiveMagicDamage.type@ to @UnitsHit.type@.

@Active.type@: Throw an @EnormousBomb.type@ at the @LargestGroup.values@ @LargestGroup.type@ that @Explodes.type@ on impact, dealing between @MinDamage.values@ (@MinDamage.scaling@) and @MaxDamage.values@ (@MaxDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ to @EnemiesHit.type@ based on their distance from the @Epicenter.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Attacks are replaced with a bomb that bounces 1 time, dealing 30/45/500 (AD + AP) magic damage to units hit.

Active: Throw an enormous bomb at the largest 4-hex group of enemies that explodes on impact, dealing between 70/105/3000 (AP) and 550/825/7000 (AP) magic damage to enemies hit based on their distance from the epicenter.

champions.name: Ziggs
champions.unlockDescription: Field a Yordle or Zaunite with 3 items and Level 9

ability.name: The Darkin Blade
ability.descriptionRaw:
On cast, cycle through one of the following abilities:

Slash in a line, dealing 135/230/2500 (AD) physical damage to enemies hit and 20% Sundering them for 4 seconds.

Swipe in a cone, dealing 135/230/2500 (AD) physical damage to enemies hit and knocking them up for 1 second.

Slam on target, dealing 135/230/2500 (AD) physical damage in a 1 hex circle. Targets below 15% max Health are executed.

champions.name: Aatrox
champions.unlockDescription: Field a unit with 40% Omnivamp in Combat + Level 8

ability.name: The Relentless Storm
ability.descriptionRaw:
Bite the target and mark them, dealing 136/215/217 (AD + AP) physical damage, increased by 60% if they are already marked. After casting 5/5/2 times, leap to a nearby hex, activating Stormbringer and dealing 136/215/217 (AD + AP) physical damage to enemies within a two hex radius.

Stormbringer: Gain 400/550/9999 Health and 50/50/999% Attack Speed. Every 2/2/0.3 seconds, summon a lightning bolt on a nearby enemy, dealing 98/161/1155 (AP + AD) magic damage. Takedowns summon a bolt on fallen enemies.

champions.name: Volibear
champions.unlockDescription: A Unit that starts combat with 3800

ability.name: Curtain Call
ability.descriptionRaw: For the next 4 Attacks, gain Infinite Range and replace attacks with a Cannon Shot. Cannon Shots deal 140/212/314 (AD + AP) physical damage. The 4th Shot deals 144% more damage.

ability.name: Stolen Might
ability.descriptionRaw:
Cast one of three spells:

Cataclysm: Leap on a nearby enemy. Deal 120/180/1000 (AP) magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes and Stun them for 1.5/1.75/30 seconds.

Demacian Justice: Deal 700/1050/99999 (AP) magic damage to target. If they are below 15% Max Health, execute them.

Final Spark: Gain 400/450/800 (AP) Shield for 1.25 seconds. Deal 380/540/1000 (AP) magic damage to all enemies in a line.

champions.name: Sylas
champions.unlockDescription: Sell a 2 Star Jarvan, a 2 Star Garen, and a 2 Star Lux

ability.name: Realm Warp: Runic Mastery
ability.descriptionRaw:
Release a runic blast, dealing 220/385/1500 magic damage. It splits in two, dealing 33% of the damage to the closest two enemies. Each secondary blast splits an additional time.

Bilgewater: Blasts explode on impact, dealing 25% of the damage as physical damage to adjacent enemies.
Demacia: Execute targets below 16% Health.
...

champions.name: Ryze
champions.unlockDescription: Field 4 Region Traits together in combat

ability.name: Relentless Pounce
ability.description:
Jump on an @AdjacentEnemy.values@ @AdjacentEnemy.type@ with the @LowestHealth.values@ @LowestHealth.type@, then deal @PrimaryDamage.values@ (@PrimaryDamage.scaling@) @PrimaryDamage.type@ to them and @SecondaryDamage.values@ (@SecondaryDamage.scaling@) @SecondaryDamage.type@ to @AdjacentEnemies.values@ @AdjacentEnemies.type@.
If any die, cast again, dealing @RepeatDamage.values@ @RepeatDamage.type@.
Tanks take @TankBonus.values@ more damage from this @Ability.type@ and Fighters take @FighterBonus.values@ more.
ability.descriptionRaw:
Jump on an adjacent enemy with the lowest health, then deal 300/450/1400 (AP) magic damage to them and 100/150/600 (AP) magic damage to adjacent enemies. If any die, cast again, dealing 70% damage.
Tanks take 50% more damage from this ability and Fighters take 25% more.

champions.name: Nidalee
champions.unlockDescription: Field two 2 Star Neekos in combat together

ability.name: Undying Rage
ability.descriptionRaw:
Become enraged for 5 seconds. While enraged, gain 25% (AP) Durability and attacks are replaced with a strike that deals 120/180/270 (AD) Physical Damage. Ignore 30% of Armor against Chilled enemies.

Bloodsworn Bond: Gain increased Move Speed. Gain 10% Attack Damage, permanently increased by 1% whenever Ashe or Tryndamere score a kill.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed

champions.name: Tryndamere
champions.unlockDescription: Field an Ashe with 2 items in combat

ability.name: Warp Armor
ability.description:
Gain @MaxHealth.values@ @MaxHealth.type@ and grow larger.
Slam in a @Circle.values@ @Circle.type@ on the @Target.type@, dealing @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ to enemies hit.
For @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@, gain @Durability.values@ @Durability.type@ + @DurabilityPerEnemy.values@ @DurabilityPerEnemy.type@ for each enemy targeting this @Unit.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Gain 350/450/1700 max Health and grow larger. Slam in a 2 Hex circle on the target, dealing 172/280/1733 (HP + AP) magic damage to enemies hit. For 4 seconds, gain 30%/30%/80% Durability + 1% for each enemy targeting this unit.

champions.name: Rift Herald
champions.unlockDescription: Have Void active for 8 player combats

ability.name: Radiant Eclipse
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: While gaining Mana, throw out 2/2/9 radiant orbs that orbit around target. They deal 40/60/90 (AP) magic damage in a 1 hex radius and drain 1 Mana from enemies hit each second. After draining 235/235/10 mana, gain a random Radiant Item. (x1/235/235/10)

Active: Detonate orbs on target, causing a 3 hex radius explosion that deals 1000/1500/10000 (AP) magic damage to target and 500/750/10000 (AP) damage to all other enemies hit.

champions.name: Mel
champions.unlockDescription: 2 Star Ambessa with 1 item dies

ability.name: Collateral Damage
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Attacks fire in a cone on target, dealing 45% damage to other enemies hit.
Active: Fire an explosive shell at target, dealing 200/300/450 (AD) Physical Damage split among enemies in a 1 Hex Circle.

Partners in Crime: When you field Graves and Twisted Fate, both gain bonuses.

champions.name: Graves
champions.unlockDescription: Field a Twisted Fate with 2 items in combat

ability.name: Impale
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: All allies gain 10/20/100 Armor.

Active: Gain 725/875/3000 (AP) Shield for 4 seconds. Impale up to three nearby enemies in a line, dealing 8400/12600/175000 (Armor) physical damage and Stunning them for 2/2.25/8 seconds.

champions.name: Skarner
champions.unlockDescription: Field a non-Tank with a Gargoyle's Stoneplate in combat

ability.name: Lunar Rush
ability.descriptionRaw: Passive: Ability damage from your strongest Leona and strongest Diana marks enemies as Moonlit, reducing their damage by 10%. Active: Gain 200/250/300 (AP) Shield for 2 seconds. Unleash a bolt of lunar energy at the farthest non-Moonlit enemy within 4 hexes, dealing 165/250/500 (AP) magic damage to them. Then, dash to all Moonlit enemies, dealing 150/225/1350 (AP) magic damage to them.

champions.name: Diana
champions.unlockDescription: Field a 2 Star Leona with 3 items in combat

ability.name: Icathian Rain
ability.description:
@DashAway.type@ from @Enemies.values@ @Enemies.type@, then fire @MissileCount.values@ @MissileCount.type@ split across the @NearestEnemies.values@ @NearestEnemies.type@.
Each missile deals @MissileDamage.values@ (@MissileDamage.scaling@) @MissileDamage.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Dash away from all enemies, then fire 15/15/25 missiles split across the 4 nearest enemies. Each missile deals 44/66/155 (AD + AP) physical damage.

champions.name: Kai'Sa
champions.unlockDescription: Field a Longshot with 3 items in combat + Level 8

ability.name: Slice and Dice
ability.descriptionRaw: Dash through enemies in the path, dealing 80/120/360 (AD) Physical Damage to all enemies in the path. Then slash 4 times, each dealing 55/85/600 (AD + AP) Physical Damage. Subsequent casts increase the number of slashes by 1.

champions.name: Renekton
champions.unlockDescription: Win 2/3/4 combats with Azir

ability.name: Fury of the Sands
ability.description:
Steal @HealthSteal.values@ (@HealthSteal.scaling@) @HealthSteal.type@ split between the @NearestEnemies.values@ @NearestEnemies.type@.
For @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@, gain @ArmorBonus.values@ @ArmorBonus.type@ and @MRBonus.values@ @MRBonus.type@ and deal @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ to @AdjacentEnemies.values@ @AdjacentEnemies.type@ each second.
ability.descriptionRaw: Steal 485/620/3000 (AP) Health split between the 4/4/8 nearest enemies. For 8 seconds, gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist and deal 23/41/583 (HP) Magic Damage to adjacent enemies each second.

champions.name: Nasus
champions.unlockDescription: Lost 2/3/4 combats with Azir

ability.name: Eye of the Ascendant
ability.description: Launch @BlastCount.values@ @BlastCount.type@ randomly split between the @ClosestEnemies.values@ @ClosestEnemies.type@ that each deal @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Launch 10/10/99 arcane blasts randomly split between the closest 4/4/10 enemies that each deal 425/700/2500 (AP) magic damage.

champions.name: Xerath
champions.unlockDescription: Alternate winning and losing 3/4/5 times with Azir

ability.name: The Box
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Each second, deal 30/45/400 (AP + MR) magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes. Heal for 40% of the damage dealt by this effect.

Active: Create a prison of walls in a 2 hex radius that lasts 5/5/60 seconds. While active, the Passive's damage is doubled. When an enemy touches a wall, they take 100/150/4000 (AP) magic damage. If there are less than 2 enemies inside The Box at any time, drag an enemy in.

champions.name: Thresh
champions.unlockDescription: Collect 150 Souls

ability.name: Snip Snip!
ability.description: @Dash.type@ around @Target.type@ and @Snips.type@ @Snips.values@ (@Snips.scaling@) times, dealing @PrimaryMagicDamage.values@ (@PrimaryMagicDamage.scaling@) @PrimaryMagicDamage.type@ to them and @SecondaryMagicDamage.values@ (@SecondaryMagicDamage.scaling@) @SecondaryMagicDamage.type@ to @AllOtherEnemies.type@ in a @Cone.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Dash around target and snip 5 times, dealing 45/68/105 (AP) magic damage to them and 20/30/50 (AP) damage to all other enemies in a cone.

champions.name: Gwen
champions.unlockDescription: Collect 20 Souls

ability.name: Endless Rend
ability.description:
Summon @Spears.values@ @Spears.type@ (@Spears.scaling@) split among the @NearestEnemies.values@ @NearestEnemies.type@.
After a brief delay, they each impale their @Target.type@, dealing @PhysicalDamage.values@ (@PhysicalDamage.scaling@) @PhysicalDamage.type@ and reducing their @Armor.type@ by @ArmorReduction.values@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Summon 21 (SOULS) spears split among the 3 nearest enemies. After a brief delay, they each impale their target, dealing 33/50/465 (AD + AP) physical damage and reducing Armor by 1.

champions.name: Kalista
champions.unlockDescription: Collect 75 Souls

ability.name: Distortions
ability.description:
Summon @Images.values@ dashing @Images.type@ that strike the @Target.type@ and up to @SecondaryTargets.values@ other @NearbyEnemies.values@ @NearbyEnemies.type@.
The @Target.type@ takes @PrimaryMagicDamage.values@ (@PrimaryMagicDamage.scaling@) @PrimaryMagicDamage.type@ and is @Stun.type@ for @StunDuration.values@ @StunDuration.type@, while other @Unit.type@ hit take @SecondaryMagicDamage.values@ (@SecondaryMagicDamage.scaling@) @SecondaryMagicDamage.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Summon 3 dashing mirror images that strike the target and up to 2 other nearby enemies. The target takes 250/375/580 (AP) magic damage and is Stunned for 1 second, while other units hit take 140/210/325 (AP) magic damage.

champions.name: LeBlanc
champions.unlockDescription: Field a Sion with 2 items in combat

ability.name: Blade of the Ruined King
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Gain 10% (AS) Attack Speed.
Active: Deal 55/85/125 (AD) Physical Damage to target. For the rest of combat, Viego's attacks deal 24/36/54 (AP) bonus stacking Magic Damage.

ability.name: Parallel Convergence
ability.description:
Create a @Zone.values@ @Zone.type@ around the @Target.type@ that lasts @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@.
The next @AttackCount.values@ @AttackCount.type@ deal @BonusMagicDamage.values@ (@BonusMagicDamage.scaling@) @BonusMagicDamage.type@.
When the zone ends, it deals @ZoneDamage.values@ (@ZoneDamage.scaling@) @ZoneDamage.type@ + @TotalDamagePercent.values@ @TotalDamagePercent.type@ of the target's damage taken during the duration to @AllEnemies.type@ in the zone.
ability.descriptionRaw:
Create a 1 Hex Zone around the target that lasts 3 seconds. The next 3 attacks deal 135/200/300 (AP) bonus magic damage.
When the zone ends, it deals 130/195/295 (AP) magic damage + 10% of the target's damage taken during the duration to all enemies in the zone.

ability.name: Traveler's Call
ability.description:
Launch @MeepsCount.values@ @MeepsCount.type@ at @NearbyEnemies.values@ @NearbyEnemies.type@ that deal @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@.
@Add.type@ @Add.values@ @MeepsCount.type@ for each @ThreeStarUnits.values@ @ThreeStarUnits.type@ on your board.
ability.descriptionRaw: Launch 6 Meeps at nearby enemies that deal 105/160/240 (AP) Magic Damage. Add 1 Meep for each 3-Star Unit on your board.

champions.name: Bard
champions.unlockDescription: Reroll 4 times before Stage 2 Carousel

ability.name: Tumble
ability.description: @Dash.type@ to a @Dash.values@, then fire a bolt at target that deals @TrueDamage.values@ (@TrueDamage.scaling@) @TrueDamage.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Tumble to a nearby hex, then fire a bolt at target that deals 106/160/245 (AD + AP) true damage.

ability.name: Transcendent State
ability.descriptionRaw: For the next 4 seconds, gain 7500%/7500%/30000% (AP) Attack Speed, infinite range, and replace attacks with Lasers. Lasers deal 85/130/450 (AD) physical damage in a line, reduced by 70/70/30% for each enemy they pass through. When Lasers critically strike, they deal 33% bonus true damage.

ability.name: Nevermove
ability.description:
@Passive.type@: Each second, restore @Heal.values@ (@Heal.scaling@) @Heal.type@ and deal @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ to @EnemiesWithin.values@ @EnemiesWithin.type@.

@Active.type@: Open a demonic eye on the @LargestGroup.values@ @LargestGroup.type@, dealing @ActiveDamage.values@ (@ActiveDamage.scaling@) @ActiveDamage.type@ and @Stunning.type@ them for @StunDuration.values@ @StunDuration.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw:
Passive: Each second, restore 40/56/158 (HP) Health and deal 20/30/90 (AP) magic damage to enemies within 1 Hex.

Active: Open a demonic eye on the largest group of nearby enemies, dealing 100/150/1800 (AP) magic damage and Stunning them for 1.75/2.5/8 seconds.

ability.name: Three Talon Strike
ability.description:
Strike @Target.type@ @StrikeCount.values@ @StrikeCount.type@.
Each strike deals @StrikeDamage.values@ (@StrikeDamage.scaling@) @StrikeDamage.type@ and restores @Heal.values@ (@Heal.scaling@) @Heal.type@.
The @FinalStrike.values@ @FinalStrike.type@ @Stunned.type@ for @StunDuration.values@ @StunDuration.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Strike target 3 times. Each strike deals 65/100/150 (AD) Physical Damage and restores 95/135/170 (AP) Health. The final one Stuns for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Mourning Mist
ability.description:
Restore @Heal.values@ (@Heal.scaling@) @Heal.type@.
Throw a globule of black mist at the @Enemy.type@ who has dealt the most damage this combat, preferring unique @Enemies.type@.
It @ChillPercent.values@ @ChillPercent.type@ them for @ChillDuration.values@ @ChillDuration.type@ and raises the @ManaCost.type@ cost of their next cast by @ManaCostIncrease.values@.
It then deals @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ in @Radius.values@ @Radius.type@.

@Chill.type@: Reduce @AttackSpeed.type@
ability.descriptionRaw:
Restore 332/377/507 (AP + Mana) Health. Throw a globule of black mist at the enemy who has dealt the most damage this combat, preferring unique enemies. It 20% Chills them for 4 seconds and raises the Mana cost of their next cast by 20. It then deals 123/187/288 (HP) Magic Damage in 1 Hex Radius.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed

champions.name: Yorick
champions.unlockDescription: Field a 2-star Viego with 2 items in combat

ability.name: Command: Protect
ability.description:
Send the @Ball.type@ to @Target.type@, dealing @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ and @Splitting.type@ @SplitDamage.values@ (@SplitDamage.scaling@) @SplitDamage.type@ among @Enemies.type@ within a @Circle.values@ @Circle.type@.
Then grant @Shield.values@ (@Shield.scaling@) @Shield.type@ to the @LowestHealthAllies.values@ @LowestHealthAllies.type@ for @ShieldDuration.values@ @ShieldDuration.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Send the Ball to target, dealing 220/330/500 (AP) Magic Damage and splitting 100/150/250 (AP) Magic Damage among enemies within a 1 Hex Circle. Then grant 80/120/200 (AP) Shield to the two lowest Health allies for 3 seconds.

champions.name: Orianna
champions.unlockDescription: 3 Piltover or higher

ability.name: Clear The Brush
ability.description: @Dash.type@ to a nearby @Dash.values@ and swing forward, dealing @Damage.values@ (@Damage.scaling@) @Damage.type@ to @Enemies.type@ in a @Range.values@ @Range.type@ line.
ability.descriptionRaw: Dash to a nearby hex and swing forward, dealing 180/270/405 (AD + AP) Physical Damage to enemies in a 2 Hexes line.

ability.name: Piltover Tussle
ability.description:
Gain @Shield.values@ (@Shield.scaling@) @Shield.type@ for @ShieldDuration.values@ @ShieldDuration.type@.
Charge and knock the target backward, @Stun.type@ them and units hit for @StunDuration.values@ @StunDuration.type@, dealing @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@.
After charging, force @NearbyEnemies.values@ @NearbyEnemies.type@ to target this @Unit.type@
ability.descriptionRaw: Gain 700/800/1000 (AP) Shield for 4 seconds. Charge and knock the target backwards, Stunning them and units hit for 1.25 seconds and dealing 150/225/360 (AP) magic damage to them. After charging, force nearby enemies to target this unit.

ability.name: Static Field
ability.description: Gain @Shield.values@ (@Shield.scaling@) @Shield.type@ for @Duration.values@ @Duration.type@ and deal @MagicDamage.values@ (@MagicDamage.scaling@) @MagicDamage.type@ to @AllEnemies.type@ within @Range.values@ @Range.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Gain 350/425/525 (AP) Shield for 4 Seconds and deal 56/84/126 (MR) Magic Damage to all enemies within 1 Hex.

ability.name: Maximum Dosage
ability.description:
@BulkUp.type@ for @BulkDuration.values@ @BulkDuration.type@.
While @Bulked.type@, restore @Heal.values@ (@Heal.scaling@) @Heal.type@ every @TickRate.values@ @TickRate.type@ and attacks deal @PhysicalDamage.values@ (@PhysicalDamage.scaling@) @PhysicalDamage.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw: Bulk Up for 5 Seconds. While Bulked, restore 114/177/275 (HP + AP) Health every Second and attacks deal 105/171/291 (HP + AD) Physical Damage.

ability.name: Divine Challenge
ability.descriptionRaw:
Dash around target and slash in a circle, dealing 100/150/1700 (AD + AP) physical damage to target and 100/150/1700 (AD + AP) physical damage to all other adjacent enemies hit. If the target doesn't die, immediately cast again.

If this Ability is cast 25 times in a row, instead slam on target, instantly killing them and dealing 100/150/1700 (AD + AP) physical damage to all enemies within 3 hexes.

champions.name: Zaahen
champions.unlockDescription: Get the Xin Zhao Champion Augment + field a 3 Star Xin Zhao for 5 Rounds

ability.name: The Culling
ability.description:
Fire @ShotCount.values@ (@ShotCount.scaling@) @ShotCount.type@ towards @Target.type@.
Each @Shot.type@ @Explodes.type@ on the @FirstEnemy.values@ @FirstEnemy.type@, dealing @PhysicalDamage.values@ (@PhysicalDamage.scaling@) @PhysicalDamage.type@ to @AllNearbyEnemies.type@.
If an @Enemy.type@ is afflicted with @BlackMist.type@, @Purify.type@ them, immediately draining their @Armor.type@ for the @TotalAmount.type@.

Fire a massive Beam at the @FurthestEnemy.type@. @Enemies.type@ hit take @Beam.values@ (@Beam.scaling@) @Beam.type@ and become afflicted with @BlackMist.type@ for @BlackMist.duration@, reducing their @ArmorReduc.type@ by @ArmorReduc.values@ each second.
@AlliesShield.type@ hit gain @AlliesShield.values@ (@AlliesShield.scaling@) @Shield.type@ for @Shield.values@ @Seconds.type@.
ability.descriptionRaw:
Fire 12/12/42 (AD) shots towards target. Each shot explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing 98/147/900 (AD + AP) physical damage to all nearby enemies. If an enemy is afflicted with Black Mist, purify them, immediately draining their Armor for the total amount.

Fire a massive beam at the furthest enemy. Enemies hit take 180/270/2000 (AD) physical damage and become afflicted with Black Mist for 15 seconds, reducing their Armor by 1/1/10 each second. Allies hit gain 180/270/2000 (AP) Shield for 4/4/15 seconds.

ability.name: You & Me!
ability.descriptionRaw: Passive: Yuumi joins your strongest Kobuko. Every 3 seconds, she alternates between healing the lowest Health ally for 140/180/240 (AP) Health or granting 25/33/50% Attack Speed to the ally who has dealt the most damage for 4 seconds. Active: Dance, restoring 176/277/446 (AP) Health over 3 seconds.

champions.name: Kobuko & Yuumi
champions.unlockDescription: 6 Star Levels of Brawler, Yordle, or Invoker
